remarks: A submodule of a finitely generated module over a Noetherian ring is finitely generated.  Often taken as the definition of Noetherian ring. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 7-Feb-2015.)
statement:
lnrfg.s $e |- S = ( Scalar ` M ) $.
lnrfgtr.u $e |- U = ( LSubSp ` M ) $.
lnrfgtr.n $e |- N = ( M |`s P ) $.
lnrfgtr $p |- ( ( M e. LFinGen /\ S e. LNoeR /\ P e. U ) -> N e. LFinGen ) $.
